docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v1 is deprecated. Please use v2. If you still need to use v1, you may do so by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: show
examples:
GET /api/users/980190962
200
{
  "user": {
    "id": 980190962,
    "login": "one",
    "firstname": "One",
    "lastname": "User",
    "mail": "userone@someware.com",
    "admin": false,
    "auth_source_id": 980190962,
    "timezone": null,
    "last_login_on": "2009-10-12 21:50:04 UTC",
    "created_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:23 UTC",
    "updated_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:23 UTC",
    "auth_source_ldap": {
      "id": 980190962,
      "type": "AuthSourceLdap",
      "name": "ldap-server",
      "host": "ldap",
      "port": 123,
      "account": null,
      "base_dn": "dn=x,dn=y",
      "ldap_filter": null,
      "attr_login": "uid",
      "attr_firstname": "givenName",
      "attr_lastname": "sn",
      "attr_mail": "mail",
      "attr_photo": null,
      "onthefly_register": true,
      "tls": true,
      "created_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:22 UTC",
      "updated_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:22 UTC"
    },
    "roles": [
      {
        "role": {
          "name": "Anonymous",
          "id": 7,
          "builtin": 2,
          "permissions": [
            "view_tasks"
          ]
        }
      },
      {
        "role": {
          "name": "Viewer",
          "id": 5,
          "builtin": 0,
          "permissions": [
            "view_operatingsystems",
            "view_hosts",
            "view_statistics",
            "access_settings",
            "access_dashboard",
            "view_organizations",
            "view_facts",
            "view_usergroups",
            "view_ptables",
            "view_authenticators",
            "view_locations",
            "view_external_variables",
            "view_media",
            "view_environments",
            "view_puppetclasses",
            "view_audit_logs",
            "view_users",
            "view_hostgroups",
            "view_domains",
            "view_models",
            "view_architectures",
            "view_realms",
            "view_globals",
            "view_reports"
          ]
        }
      }
    ],
    "domains_andor": "or",
    "hostgroups_andor": "or",
    "facts_andor": "or",
    "compute_resources_andor": "or",
    "filter_on_owner": null
